channel.title: Sprint jumping y have you betrayed me
channel.description: Well, I've tried sprinting while jumping in BM several times, and it's time to face facts - I can't. Is there a correct button combination? Because it just doesn't seem to want me jumping while sprinting.

item.title: Sprint jumping y have you betrayed me
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I can sprint+crouch+jump while also prop-surfing and brush-clipping in midair while using the crossbow aim to shoot a snark from 200ft away.

But seriously, it’s true that it could be your keyboard but also some keyboards have specific combinations you can’t do (like shift+up+left works but not shift+up+right) you could also download an auto crouch jump script somewhere on these forums.

Read full topic
item.source: Sprint jumping y have you betrayed me

item.title: Sprint jumping y have you betrayed me
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Maybe it’s a problem with your keyboard? Stupid ghosting. You could try changing your key setup, but I’m sure that;s not very ideal.

Read full topic
item.source: Sprint jumping y have you betrayed me
